verses.verse: וַֽיִּגְּשׁוּ֙ <S%H5066><s%> vai-yig-ge-Shu came near כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei Then all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֔ים <S%H2428><s%> ha-cha-ya-Lim, of the forces וְיֽוֹחָנָן֙ <S%H3110><s%> ve-yo-cha-Nan and Johanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son קָרֵ֔חַ <S%H7143><s%> ka-Re-ach, of Kareah וִֽיזַנְיָ֖ה <S%H3153><s%> vi-zan-Yah and Jezaniah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son הוֹשַֽׁעְיָ֑ה <S%H1955><s%> ho-sha'-Yah; of Hoshaiah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am and all the people מִקָּטֹ֥ן <S%H6996><s%> mik-ka-Ton from the least וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against גָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol. even unto the greatest

וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And said אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu unto Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֗יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi, the prophet תִּפָּל־ <S%H5307><s%> tip-pol- be accepted נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> na Please תְחִנָּתֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H8467><s%> te-chin-na-Te-nu Let we beseech thee our supplication לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha, before וְהִתְפַּלֵּ֤ל <S%H6419><s%> ve-hit-pal-Lel thee and pray בַּעֲדֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5704><s%> ba-'a-De-nu us אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for us unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God בְּעַ֖ד <S%H1157><s%> be-'Ad about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- for all הַשְּׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> hash-she-'e-Rit [even] for all this remnant הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot; likewise כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because נִשְׁאַ֤רְנוּ <S%H7604><s%> nish-'Ar-nu (for we are left מְעַט֙ <S%H4592><s%> me-'At [but] a few מֵֽהַרְבֵּ֔ה <S%H7235><s%> me-har-Beh, of many כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher your עֵינֶ֖יךָ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-cha as thine eyes רֹא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> ro-'ot do behold אֹתָֽנוּ׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ta-nu.

וְיַגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> ve-yag-ged- may shew לָ֙נוּ֙ la-nu יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> had-De-rech us the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נֵֽלֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> ne-lech- walk בָּ֑הּ Bah; וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var and the thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-Seh. that we may do

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem then יִרְמְיָ֤הוּ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu Then Jeremiah הַנָּבִיא֙ <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi the prophet שָׁמַ֔עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-ti, unto them I have heard הִנְנִ֧י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni I am going מִתְפַּלֵּ֛ל <S%H6419><s%> mit-pal-Lel [you] behold I will pray אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God כְּדִבְרֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1697><s%> ke-div-rei-Chem; according to your words וְֽהָיָ֡ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- the whole הַדָּבָר֩ <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var and it shall come to pass [that] whatsoever thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יַעֲנֶ֨ה <S%H6030><s%> ya-'a-Neh shall answer יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem אַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> 'ag-Gid you I will declare לָכֶ֔ם <S%H99999><s%> la-Chem, לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- I will not אֶמְנַ֥ע <S%H4513><s%> 'em-Na' back מִכֶּ֖ם <S%H4480><s%> mik-Kem at דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> da-Var. nothing

וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem-mah they אָמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Ru Then they said אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu, to Jeremiah יְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> ye-Hi become יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD בָּ֔נוּ Ba-nu, לְעֵ֖ד <S%H5707><s%> le-'Ed witness אֱמֶ֣ת <S%H571><s%> 'e-Met be a true וְנֶאֱמָ֑ן <S%H539><s%> ve-ne-'e-Man; and faithful אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if לֹ֡א <S%H3808><s%> lo not כְּֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ke-chol- the whole הַ֠דָּבָר <S%H1697><s%> Had-da-vor not even according to all things אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יִֽשְׁלָחֲךָ֜ <S%H7971><s%> yish-la-cha-Cha shall send יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for the which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-nu about כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken not נַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-Seh. between us if we do

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- Whether ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov Whether [it be] good וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- or רָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> Ra', or whether [it be] evil בְּק֣וֹל׀ <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher to whom; אֲנוּ 'a-nu כאֲנַ֜חְנוּ <S%H580><s%> 'a-Nach-nu we קשֹׁלְחִ֥ים <S%H7971><s%> sho-le-Chim send אֹתְךָ֛ <S%H853><s%> 'o-te-Cha אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about נִשְׁמָ֑ע <S%H8085><s%> nish-Ma'; we will obey לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an so אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher to whom יִֽיטַב־ <S%H3190><s%> yi-tav- thee that it may be well לָ֔נוּ <S%H99999><s%> La-nu, כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki when נִשְׁמַ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> nish-Ma', with us when we obey בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol the voice יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. our God ס sa-Mek

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came מִקֵּ֖ץ <S%H7093><s%> mik-Ketz And it came to pass after עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> 'a-Se-ret ten יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim; days וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- that the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִרְמְיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu. came unto Jeremiah

וַיִּקְרָ֗א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra, Then called אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about יֽוֹחָנָן֙ <S%H3110><s%> yo-cha-Nan he Johanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son קָרֵ֔חַ <S%H7143><s%> ka-Re-ach, of Kareah וְאֶ֛ל <S%H413><s%> ve-'El and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei and all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֖ים <S%H2428><s%> ha-cha-ya-Lim of the forces אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To; for וּלְכָ֨ל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-le-Chal- and for all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, which [were] with him and all the people לְמִקָּטֹ֥ן <S%H6996><s%> le-mik-ka-Ton from the least וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against גָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol. even to the greatest

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, to כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher to whom שְׁלַחְתֶּ֤ם <S%H7971><s%> she-lach-Tem unto whom ye sent אֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to לְהַפִּ֥יל <S%H5307><s%> le-hap-Pil me to present תְּחִנַּתְכֶ֖ם <S%H8467><s%> te-chin-nat-Chem your supplication לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav. before

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If שׁ֤וֹב <S%H7725><s%> Shov If ye will still תֵּֽשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> te-she-Vu abide בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz in this land הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot, I וּבָנִ֤יתִי <S%H1129><s%> u-va-Ni-ti then will I build אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and not אֶהֱרֹ֔ס <S%H2040><s%> 'e-he-Ros, you and not pull [you] down וְנָטַעְתִּ֥י <S%H5193><s%> ve-na-ta'-Ti and I will plant אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and not אֶתּ֑וֹשׁ <S%H5428><s%> et-Toosh; you and not pluck [you] up כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for נִחַ֙מְתִּי֙ <S%H5162><s%> ni-Cham-ti for I repent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- concerning הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Ah, me of the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher i עָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti that I have done לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּֽירְא֗וּ <S%H3372><s%> ti-re-'U, Be not afraid מִפְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei of מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel, of Babylon אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem ye יְרֵאִ֖ים <S%H3373><s%> ye-re-'Im ye are afraid מִפָּנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> mip-pa-Nav; of whom אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּֽירְא֤וּ <S%H3372><s%> ti-re-'U be not afraid מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu of him' נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- of him saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אִתְּכֶ֣ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem for אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni, I לְהוֹשִׁ֧יעַ <S%H3467><s%> le-ho-Shi-a' for I [am] with you to save אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem וּלְהַצִּ֥יל <S%H5337><s%> u-le-hatz-Tzil you and to deliver אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem מִיָּדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-Do. you from his hand

וְאֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-'et-Ten And I will shew לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem רַחֲמִ֖ים <S%H7356><s%> ra-cha-Mim mercies וְרִחַ֣ם <S%H7355><s%> ve-ri-Cham unto you that he may have mercy אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem; וְהֵשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> ve-he-Shiv upon you and cause you to return אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַדְמַתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H127><s%> 'ad-mat-Chem. to your own land

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if אֹמְרִ֣ים <S%H559><s%> 'o-me-Rim But if ye say אַתֶּ֔ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem, you לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo We will not נֵשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> ne-Shev We will not dwell בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz in this land הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot; likewise לְבִלְתִּ֣י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti not שְׁמֹ֔עַ <S%H8085><s%> she-Mo-a', neither obey בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol the voice יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God
